price: 11. Markaasaan ka dhowrnay inay (shanqar) maqlaan (oo ku sii deynay hurdo) hogga dhexdiisa tiro sanooyin ah.
arabic: فَضَرَبۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ فِي ٱلۡكَهۡفِ سِنِينَ عَدَدٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faḍarabnā ʿalā ādhānihim fī al-kahfi sinīna ʿadadan
